name: Boids will be Boids
description:
Play with friends on the same Keyboard!

Play in Fullscreen! (there is a dead area in the sides of the webplayer)

Movement + Attack-->

Player 1: Arrows + ";"  /  Player 2: WASD + Z  /  Player 3: TFGH + V  /  Player 4: IJKL + M  /  Player 5: 8456 (numpad) + 0 (numpad)

Attack to Destroy other players. Last player alive Wins!

Mimic the Flock behavior so not to be discovered.  Join the Boids!

Flock Algorithm tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mjKINQigAE4&list=PL5KbKbJ6Gf99UlyIqzV1UpOzseyRn5...

Split keyboard tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g_s0y5yFxYg&ab_channel=samyam

Music:

https://freesound.org/people/RutgerMuller/sounds/51278/

https://freesound.org/people/Xythe/sounds/100870/

https://freesound.org/people/envirOmaniac2/sounds/398941/

https://freesound.org/people/plasterbrain/sounds/464914/

Any questions, feel free to ask in the comments!

Hope you enjoy! Thanks!
